type.name: org.gradle.api.reporting.ConfigurableReport
type.description: A file based report to be created with a configurable destination.

method.name: setDestination
method.description:
Sets the destination for the report. The file parameter is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).
param:file The destination for the report.

property.name: destination
property.description:
Sets the destination for the report. The file parameter is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).
param:file The destination for the report.
